recommended_degree: Kimia Tekstil, Kimia Industri, Teknik Kimia, Teknik Kimia Polimer, Teknologi Kimia Tekstil (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
1. Lead and develop the laboratory team.
2. Maintain daily activities or filling documentation.
3. Manage the testing laboratory: color matching, fabric testing, and Lab Dip approval.
4. Carry out any additional assignments as directed by manufacturing management.
5. Resolve quality issues and offer advice to relevant departments.
6. Maintain Laboratory's certifications.
7. Improve production process based on lean manufacturing system.
